short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to set up pause time, and sketch every video you watch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sketch Every Video is a Chrome extension that helps you practice sketching with *YouTube* and *BiliBili* (Other web on the way) videos. It automatically pauses videos at set intervals, allowing you to sketch scenes before resuming. Customize the number of pauses and the time between each pause to create a seamless sketching routine while watching your favorite videos. 

Enjoy your practice!
